resources.string: Autotrenig in itself is precisely self-awareness, a shift of yours “I” from the secondary consciousness to the primary and work with the primary consciousness at the level of primary consciousness. Now we call him in a certain transformed, altered form - an autogenous training, thanks to Schultz, as we already said. But it works at the level of primary consciousness, therefore various changes occur in the body and etc.

Meditation is a more complicated practice. We work with the help of the primary consciousness with the secondary, we study the system, practically being in the system, delving deeper, only leaving it slightly, we begin to study it, but without harm to ourselves. And meditation in itself, whatever it is, it just remains meditation. This is work at the level of primary consciousness.

Spiritual practice - "it is when the Personality going beyond the limits on which consciousness can function." This is precisely what develops the Person. This is observing the primary consciousness, the secondary consciousness, all their combinations, manifestations, self-awareness of oneself as part of the Spiritual World. This is the perception of the Spiritual World. Well, and as the ultimate goal - it is a merger with the Spiritual World or becoming part of It.
